data.system_settings: iPad Pro 9.7 w/ Smart Keyboard - iOS 11
data.actual_result: DIscord is in portrait mode but there is a black box at the bottom
data.expected_result: Discord should display in portrait mode
data.short_description: Discord thinks your still in landscape mode [iPad Pro Smart Keyboard Only]
data.steps_to_repro: - Open discord **Make sure you have the Smart Keyboard attached at ALL times, and in typing position** - Open a random server - Go to a random chat in that server - Type something random in the chat, just dont hit send yet - Then open Safari - Switch to portrait mode **Still have your keyboard attached and in typing position** - Go to Discord’s website - Open discord through the app switcher, make sure you stay in portrait
